title: How much upload speed is needed for LoL?
body:
Title.
Currently doing fine with 0.4 but I'm moving to a new home with 0.2 mb/s

replies.body:
According to my netbalancer it average 8kbs^ while playing.

You could probably play League on a dial-up connection (if it didn't take forever to download it that is...)

Wow, 8kb/s isn't much!
Thanks you and the others for their time!
Have a nice day

If you're doing alright with .4 upload, I would think you could still play relatively okay. I'm not 100% sure of the upload speed needed for League but I'd recommend testing your new internet in a custom or practice match once you get all moved! If you do have some problems, a hardwired connection will give you a better upload so you could try that out.

Hi
Unfortunately I won't be able to test LoL untill I'm moved,guess I'll have to hope it's enough. I'm no expert but decreasing graphic quality wouldn't decrease data upload, would it?
Here it's late so forgive my English :D

Graphic quality is purely for yourself.

The game sends bits of game data on what is happening to/from computers and server. 

Ideally the only time your data would "spike" for uploads is in massive skillshot teamfights (as there is more data to send/receive), but even then .2 should be fine.
Yea, I don't think decreasing your graphics would improve the upload speed of your network sadly, but hey it's worth trying when you get there eh?
